message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $9000. This is a great price, considering the product's value to you is $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to pay a bit less than the original price, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original prices. I'm offering the product to you for $8500. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm offering the product to you for $8200. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great value considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $8200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
